item.title: nkelber on "how do I change my user thumbnail for dhanswers?"
item.dc:creator: nkelber
item.description: I just sorted this out. Your Gravatar email must match the email that DH Question and Answers has in your profile. Kind of annoying, but it's not too tough to sort out.

item.title: Joe Gilbert on "how do I change my user thumbnail for dhanswers?"
item.dc:creator: Joe Gilbert
item.description:
Hi Stéfan,

Like WordPress.com and GitHub, DHAnswers retrieves profile pictures from the Gravatar service (https://www.gravatar.com/). If you don't have a gravatar, the system will display a lovely, random geometric design instead.

item.title: Stéfan Sinclair on "how do I change my user thumbnail for dhanswers?"
item.dc:creator: Stéfan Sinclair
item.description: I must be missing something obvious, but when I go to the editing page for my profile, I can't seem to find a mechanism for changing my thumbnail picture.
